string.value: #p2111002# confessed his research hasn't taken steps forward these days, but then he lightened up and told me he found a cure for #p2111005#... What? #bA medicine for #p2111005##k? But everything in #p2111002#'s house seemed to have been cleaned out. \n\nIf he didn't try so darndest to hide this, then someone from Alcadno that might have gotten through #p2111002#'s Lab Report. I better go see #b#p2111001##k of Alcadno, since he searched #p2111002#'s whole house.
When I told #p2111001# of #p2111002#, he seemed genuinely shocked.
...Hey, what brought you back here. ...what? You met with #p2111002#'s afterimage? He mentioned something about #p2111005#'s medicine...?
Hmm... this is interesting. Why isn't he banned?
